review.description: Out of the three delis on Dekalb, this is the best one since they're fast when it comes to making my food and their workers are really nice, compared to other ones where they have made sexual remarks
review.author: Karen W.

review.description: As usual with my reviews of delis, I look for some sort of horrible flaw and if it's not there I give them 4 stars. This place was fine.
review.author: Dominik D.
